metadata.warning: Immigration rules change frequently. Always verify with official sources.

programs.program_name: Federal Skilled Worker Program (FSW)

language.english_min: No minimum for eligibility, but affects selection points

selection_system.note: 67 points needed for FSW selection factors. Separate CRS score determines Express Entry invitation.

recent_draws.note: As of October 2025, draws focused on Canadian Experience Class and category-based selection

programs.program_name: Canadian Experience Class (CEC)

education.note: Can improve CRS score if provided

language.english_min: CLB 7 for NOC TEER 0 or 1; CLB 5 for NOC TEER 2 or 3
language.french_min: NCLC 7 for NOC TEER 0 or 1; NCLC 5 for NOC TEER 2 or 3

age.note: No minimum age requirement, but affects CRS score

settlement_funds.note: Not required for CEC

selection_system.note: Uses Comprehensive Ranking System (CRS) for Express Entry pool ranking

programs.program_name: Federal Skilled Trades Program (FST)

language.english_min: CLB 5 for speaking and listening; CLB 4 for reading and writing
language.french_min: NCLC 5 for speaking and listening; NCLC 4 for reading and writing

connection_requirements.job_offer_required: Valid job offer (1 year minimum) OR certificate of qualification

selection_system.note: Uses CRS for Express Entry ranking

programs.program_name: Atlantic Immigration Program (AIP)

work_experience.timeframe: Within last 5 years (before job offer date)
work_experience.exemption: International graduates from Atlantic Canada institutions - no work experience required

education.min_level: Depends on job offer TEER category
education.TEER_0_1: Canadian 1-year post-secondary OR foreign equivalent with ECA
education.TEER_2_3_4: Canadian high school diploma OR foreign equivalent with ECA

settlement_funds.note: Not required if already working in Canada with valid work permit

connection_requirements.job_offer_duration: At least 1 year after permanent residence

international_graduate_requirements.completion_timeframe: Within 24 months before applying for PR
international_graduate_requirements.residence_requirement: At least 16 months in Atlantic province during last 2 years before graduation

programs.program_name: Rural and Northern Immigration Pilot (RNIP)
programs.province: Participating communities in ON, MB, SK, AB, BC
participating_communities: West Kootenay (Trail, Castlegar, Rossland, Nelson), BC

work_experience.exemption: Graduates from post-secondary in recommending community

education.min_level: High school diploma or post-secondary certificate/degree

settlement_funds.note: Must demonstrate sufficient funds to support transition to community

connection_requirements.intent_to_reside: Must intend to live in the recommending community

programs.program_name: Agri-Food Pilot

work_experience.location: In Canada through Temporary Foreign Worker Program

education.min_level: High school diploma or post-secondary certificate/degree
education.note_applicants_in_canada: Can meet EITHER job offer OR education requirement (not both)

connection_requirements.wage_requirement: At or above prevailing wage for occupation and province
connection_requirements.note_applicants_in_canada: Can choose to meet job offer OR education requirement

programs.program_name: Start-Up Visa Program

language.english_min: CLB 5 in all abilities (listening, reading, writing, speaking)

settlement_funds.note: Must show sufficient funds to settle and live before business generates income

connection_requirements.designated_organization: Must receive letter from designated venture capital fund, angel investor, or business incubator
connection_requirements.ownership_requirement: Each applicant must hold 10% or more voting rights
connection_requirements.majority_ownership: Applicants + designated organization must hold >50% voting rights

business_requirements.management: Active and ongoing management from inside Canada
business_requirements.operations: Essential part of business operations in Canada

programs.program_name: Home Care Worker Immigration Pilots (Child Care & Home Support)
programs.status: Workers in Canada stream open; Applicants not in Canada stream closed

work_experience.note: Reduced from 24 months to 6 months as of June 2024
work_experience.timeframe: Within or outside Canada, no earlier than 3 years before PR application

settlement_funds.note: Must demonstrate sufficient funds

connection_requirements.job_offer_type: Full-time job in home child care or home support
employer_types: Organizations that employ homecare workers full-time

selection_system.cap: 2,750 principal applicants per pilot annually (5,500 total)

programs.program_name: Ontario Immigrant Nominee Program – Employer Job Offer: Foreign Worker Stream

language.english_min: CLB 5 for TEER 0,1; CLB 4 for TEER 2,3
language.french_min: NCLC 5 for TEER 0,1; NCLC 4 for TEER 2,3

settlement_funds.note: Not explicitly required for OINP

connection_requirements.wage_requirement: At or above median wage for occupation in Ontario

programs.program_name: Ontario Immigrant Nominee Program – Masters Graduate Stream

education.min_level: Masters degree from eligible Ontario university
education.study_status: Must have been in good standing

settlement_funds.note: Must demonstrate sufficient funds

connection_requirements.residence_requirement: Must have lived in Ontario for at least 12 of last 24 months

programs.program_name: Ontario Immigrant Nominee Program – PhD Graduate Stream

settlement_funds.note: Must demonstrate sufficient funds

connection_requirements.residence_requirement: Must have lived in Ontario for at least 12 of last 24 months

programs.program_name: Ontario Immigrant Nominee Program – Employer Job Offer: In-Demand Skills Stream

work_experience.note: 9 months cumulative work experience in Ontario in last 3 years

education.min_level: Canadian high school diploma OR foreign equivalent with ECA

programs.program_name: Ontario Immigrant Nominee Program – Employer Job Offer: Foreign Worker Stream

language.english_min: CLB 5 for TEER 0,1; CLB 4 for TEER 2,3
language.french_min: NCLC 5 for TEER 0,1; NCLC 4 for TEER 2,3

settlement_funds.note: Not explicitly required for OINP

connection_requirements.wage_requirement: At or above median wage for occupation in Ontario

programs.program_name: Ontario Immigrant Nominee Program – Masters Graduate Stream

education.min_level: Masters degree from eligible Ontario university
education.study_status: Must have been in good standing

settlement_funds.note: Must demonstrate sufficient funds

connection_requirements.residence_requirement: Must have lived in Ontario for at least 12 of last 24 months

programs.program_name: Ontario Immigrant Nominee Program – PhD Graduate Stream

settlement_funds.note: Must demonstrate sufficient funds

connection_requirements.residence_requirement: Must have lived in Ontario for at least 12 of last 24 months

programs.program_name: Ontario Immigrant Nominee Program – Employer Job Offer: In-Demand Skills Stream

work_experience.note: 9 months cumulative work experience in Ontario in last 3 years

education.min_level: Canadian high school diploma OR foreign equivalent with ECA

programs.program_name: BC Provincial Nominee Program – Skills Immigration: Skilled Worker

work_experience.timeframe: Full-time equivalent work experience in last 10 years

education.min_level: Minimum education credential required for occupation

settlement_funds.note: Must meet minimum income requirements based on family size and residence area

connection_requirements.wage_requirement: Within wage range for occupation and location (WorkBC/Job Bank)

occupation_in_demand.note: BC PNP prioritizes workers in healthcare, construction, early childhood education, and in-demand occupations

programs.program_name: BC Provincial Nominee Program – Skills Immigration: International Graduate

work_experience.note: No work experience required, but recommended

education.min_level: Degree, diploma or certificate from eligible Canadian post-secondary institution
education.program_duration: At least 8 months (two semesters) full-time equivalent

settlement_funds.note: Must meet minimum wage and income requirements

connection_requirements.wage_requirement: Within wage range for occupation and location

programs.program_name: BC Provincial Nominee Program – Skills Immigration: Entry Level and Semi-Skilled

work_experience.note: 9 months consecutive full-time work with supporting employer

settlement_funds.note: Must meet minimum wage and income requirements

connection_requirements.job_offer_noc: Eligible TEER 4 or 5 occupations in tourism/hospitality or food processing

programs.program_name: Alberta Advantage Immigration Program – Alberta Express Entry Stream

work_experience.note: Must meet federal Express Entry requirements

education.min_level: Must meet federal Express Entry requirements

language.english_min: Must meet federal Express Entry requirements

settlement_funds.note: Must meet federal Express Entry requirements

connection_requirements.intent_to_reside: Must intend to live and work in Alberta

programs.program_name: Alberta Advantage Immigration Program – Alberta Opportunity Stream

work_experience.option_1: 12 months full-time in Alberta within last 18 months
work_experience.option_2: 24 months full-time in Canada/abroad within last 30 months
work_experience.PGWP_exception: 6 months in Alberta within last 18 months

language.english_min: CLB 4 minimum (CLB 5 for TEER 2,3; CLB 7 for TEER 0,1)

connection_requirements.current_employment: Must be working in occupation at time of application
connection_requirements.licensing_required: If occupation is regulated in Alberta

programs.program_name: New Brunswick Provincial Nominee Program – Skilled Worker Stream

work_experience.full_time_equivalent: 30 hours per week, 1,560 hours per year

language.english_min: CLB 7 for TEER 0,1; CLB 5 for TEER 2,3
language.french_min: NCLC 7 for TEER 0,1; NCLC 5 for TEER 2,3

settlement_funds.note: Must demonstrate sufficient funds

connection_requirements.job_offer_type: Full-time, non-seasonal, at least 30 hours per week

programs.program_name: Nova Scotia Nominee Program – Skilled Worker Stream
Newfoundland and Labrador Provincial Nominee Program – Skilled Worker Category

work_experience.note: Work experience requirements vary by occupation

language.test_validity: Must be valid throughout application process

settlement_funds.note: Must demonstrate ability to economically establish

connection_requirements.job_offer_type: Full-time, minimum 30 hours per week, at least 1 year duration
connection_requirements.wage_requirement: Regional, provincial, or national prevailing wage
connection_requirements.employer_requirements: Eligible NL employer, valid JVA if no work permit

programs.program_name: Newfoundland and Labrador Provincial Nominee Program – Express Entry Skilled Worker

work_experience.note: Must meet federal Express Entry requirements

education.min_level: Canadian post-secondary degree/diploma OR valid ECA

language.english_min: Must meet federal Express Entry requirements
language.french_min: Must meet federal Express Entry requirements

programs.program_name: Prince Edward Island Provincial Nominee Program – Labour Impact: Skilled Worker Stream

connection_requirements.job_offer_type: Full-time, permanent or at least 2 years

programs.program_name: Quebec Skilled Worker Selection Program (SWSP) - Stream 1: Highly Qualified and Specialized Skills

education.min_level: Minimum 1 year full-time study (DEP, AEC, DEC, certificate, bachelor's, master's, or PhD)
education.eca_required: Not required but can be submitted
education.equivalent_hours: 900 hours at secondary/college or 30 credits at university

language.french_min: Oral French: Level 7 or higher; Written French: Level 5 or higher (Échelle québécoise)
language.note: French proficiency is mandatory as of November 2023

settlement_funds.note: Must sign Financial Self-Sufficiency Contract (3 months support)

connection_requirements.intent_to_reside: Must intend to settle in Quebec

additional_requirements.values_attestation: Must obtain Attestation of learning of democratic and Quebec values
additional_requirements.self_employment_restriction: Cannot control company directly or indirectly

programs.program_name: Saskatchewan Immigrant Nominee Program – International Skilled Worker: Saskatchewan Express Entry

work_experience.note: Must meet federal Express Entry requirements

education.min_level: Must meet federal Express Entry requirements

language.note: Must meet federal Express Entry requirements

settlement_funds.note: Must meet federal Express Entry requirements

programs.program_name: Manitoba Provincial Nominee Program – Skilled Worker in Manitoba Stream

work_experience.note: 6 months full-time work for current Manitoba employer

settlement_funds.note: Must demonstrate settlement funds

connection_requirements.current_employment: Must be working for Manitoba employer
connection_requirements.intent_to_reside: Must intend to live and work in Manitoba
